ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: i actually have a few questions about this stuff. +1 str == +1 atk right? now, is atk like ac in that it is made of up 2 numbers, like chance to hit, and
ygData.messageBody:
i actually have a few questions about this stuff.
+1 str == +1 atk right?

now, is atk like ac in that it is made of up 2 numbers, like chance to hit, and damage
done, sorta like damage avoidance and damage absorption? if so, then real damage
applied would also have to increase.

anyone got a good link to the analysis done on this?



At 04:39 PM 10/11/00 -0700, you wrote:
>At 04:21 PM 10/11/00 -0700, jhenders@... wrote:
>
> >And what good is STR on the earlier songs anyway? All the player studies
> >I've seen, which have been just as thorough as the work John Kim used to
> >do, show 50 str adds about 0.03% dmg over the long term. That's about as
> >impressive as a 2pt dmg sheild at L30.
> >
> >[note to Shada, this is an addition to your post, not a reply ;)]
>
>Ah, then why the heck are all the tanks going for STR stuff? Are they all
>misguided? /shrug
>
>The only reason I personally like more STR in equipment (not songs) is so
>that I can carry more. I keep hearing that STR increases your damage in the
>long run, but I've never really watched this very closely.
>
> >On Wed, Oct 11/00, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> ><garramone@...> wrote:
> > > not at level 54+.
> > >
> > > Shada
> > >
> > > > Also, our haste song (to use the example of the enchanter
> > > > keeping 3 tanks
> > > > hasted) does have the added component of STR.
>
>Lol. Ah, yea. I never looked that far ahead in bard songs. Well when you
>are grouped with an enchanter, you obviously aren't in the group for your
>speed boost. Would Verses of Victory be a poor option for a level 54+ bard?
>
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
